title: LG confirms three more phones for its Android 12 roadmap, leaves out LG Wing and V60
content:
Despite the company having been absent from the smartphone market for a full year now, LG isn’t done supporting its existing devices. This week, the company posted a new roadmap that confirms Android 12 updates for the LG V50 and more, but oddly not the LG Wing.

more…

The post LG confirms three more phones for its Android 12 roadmap, leaves out LG Wing and V60 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The LG V50 was one of three devices to get a confirmed timeline for Android 12, but the company neglected to say anything about V60 or Wing.
